1.verse: UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  ngokwedinga lobomi obukuKristu Yesu,

2.verse: ubhalela uTimoti, umntwana wakhe oyintanda; uthi, Makube lubabalo, nenceba, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, noKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.

3.verse: Ndinokubulela kuye uThixo, endamkhonzayo kwakoomawokhulu ndinesazela esihlambulukileyo, ndikukhumbula njengokungapheliyo, ekukhungeni kwam ubusuku nemini;

4.verse: ndilangazelela ukunga ndingakubona, ndizikhumbula nje iinyembezi zakho, ukuze ndizaliswe luvuyo;

5.verse: ndikhunjuzwa nje ukholo olukuwe olungenakuhanahanisa, lona lwahlalayo kuqala kunyokokhulu uLoyisi, nakunyoko uYunike,  endinyanisileyo ke ukuthi luhleli nakuwe.

6.verse: Endithi ngenxa yelo thuba ndikukhumbuze, ukuba usikhwezele isipho sokubabalwa kwakho nguThixo, esikhoyo kuwe ngokubekwa kwezandla zam phezu kwakho.

7.verse: Kuba uThixo akasinikanga moya wabugwala; wasinika owamandla,  nowothando, nowesidima.

8.verse: Ngoko ke musa ukuba nazintloni ngabo ubungqina beNkosi yethu, nangam, mna mbanjwa wayo; suka uve ububi kunye nam ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo, ngokwamandla kaThixo;

9.verse: owasisindisayo, wasibiza ngobizo olungcwele, engenzi ngokwemisebenzi yethu, esenza ngokweyakhe ingqibo, nobabalo,  esababalwa ngalo ngoKristu Yesu phambi kwamaxesha aphakade;

10.verse: lwabonakaliswa ke ngoku ngako ukubonakala koMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu, owakubhangisayo okunene ukufa, kodwa wabukhanyisa ubomi nokungonakali, ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi;

11.verse: endamiselwa zona mna, ndaba ngumvakalisi nompostile nomfundisi weentlanga;

12.verse: endithi kananjalo ngenxa yeli thuba ndive obu bunzima. Noko ke andinazintloni; kuba ndiyamazi endikholiweyo nguye; kanjalo ndithi, ndeyisekile ukuba unako ukuyigcina into endimphathisileyo, ese kuloo mini.

13.verse: Umzekelo wamazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wubambe elukholweni naseluthandweni olukuKristu Yesu.

14.verse: Loo nto intle uyiphathisiweyo, yigcine ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ohleliyo ngaphakathi kwethu.

15.verse: Oku uyakwazi, ukuba bandinikele umva bonke abaseAsiya;  abanoFigelo noHermogene.

16.verse: Yanga iNkosi ingayenzela inceba indlu kaOnesiforo; ngokuba kwaba futhi endiphumza, akaba nazintloni nguwo umxokelelwane wam.

17.verse: Wathi akuba eseRoma, wandifuna ngokukhuthala okukhulu,  wandifumana.

18.verse: Yanga iNkosi ingamfumanisa inceba eNkosini ngaloo mini.  Nguwena waziyo kakuhle oko zingako izinto awalungiselela ngazo e-Efese.

1.verse: Wena ngoko, mntwana wam, yomelela elubabalweni olukuKristu Yesu;

2.verse: uthi nezinto owazivayo kum ngamangqina amaninzi, ezo uzibeke phambi kwabantu abathembekileyo, bona baya kukulingana ukufundisa nabanye.

3.verse: Wena ngoko bunyamezele ububi, njengomphumi-mkhosi olungileyo kaKristu Yesu.

4.verse: Akukho namnye uthi, ephuma umkhosi, azibhijele ngemicimbi yobu bomi; ukuze amkholise lowo umnyulele ukuphuma umkhosi.

5.verse: Nakuba ke ubani esithi azame emdlalweni, akathweswa sithsaba, ukuba akathanga azame ngokomthetho.

6.verse: Umlimi lowo ubulalekayo, umelwe kukwamkela kuqala kwiziqhamo.

7.verse: Ziqiqe izinto endizithethayo; iNkosi yokupha ke ingqondo ezintweni zonke.

8.verse: Mkhumbule uYesu Kristu, engovukileyo kwabafileyo,  engowembewu kaDavide, ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo;

9.verse: endiva ububi ngenxa yazo, kude kuse ezintanjeni, njengomenzi wobubi; ke lona ilizwi likaThixo alibotshiwe.

10.verse: Ngenxa yoko izinto zonke ndiyazinyamezela ngenxa yabo abanyulwa, ukuze nabo bamkele usindiso olukuKristu Yesu,  ndawonye nozuko olungunaphakade.

11.verse: Lithembekile ilizwi eli: Kuba xa safa naye, sodla ubomi kwandawonye naye;

12.verse: ukuba siyanyamezela, solawula kwandawonye naye; ukuba siyamkhanyela, naye wosikhanyela;

13.verse: ukuba asithembekile, yena uhlala ethembekile; akanako ukuzikhanyeza.

14.verse: Bakhumbuze ezo zinto, uqononondise emehlweni eNkosi, ukuba kungenziwa mfazwe yamazwi angancedi lutho, kuze kubhukuqeke abaphulaphuli.

15.verse: Kukhuthalele ukuzimisa phambi koThixo ucikidekile,  ungumsebenzi ongenazintloni, ulungisa ukulahlula ilizwi lenyaniso.

16.verse: Ke zona iintetho ezingento, ezihlambelayo, zinxweme; kuba ziya kuhambela phambili kokukhona kungahloneli Thixo.

17.verse: Nelizwi labo liya kudla njengesilonda esiqhenqethayo;  abanoHimenayo noFileto,

18.verse: abathe bona bayiphosa inyaniso, besithi uvuko seluthe lwakho, kananjalo belubhukuqa ukholo lwenxenye.

19.verse: Noko ke limi, lithe nkqi, ilitye lesiseko likaThixo,  linambhalo uthi, INkosi iyabazi abangabayo; nothi, Mabasuke kuko ukungalungisi, bonke abalibizayo igama likaKristu.

20.verse: Ke endlwini enkulu akubikho zitya zagolide nazasilivere zodwa; kubakho nezomthi nezomdongwe. Inxenye ke zezembeko,  inxenye azizambeko.

21.verse: Ukuba ngoko umntu uthe wazikhuphulula kwezo zinto, woba sisitya sembeko, singcwalisiwe, simlungele kakuhle umninindlu,  silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.

22.verse: Ke zibaleke iinkanuko zobutsha; phuthuma ke ubulungisa,  ukholo, uthando, uxolo nabo bayinqulayo iNkosi ngokwasentliziyweni ehlambulukileyo.

23.verse: Yinxweme imibuzwana yobudenge engenangqeqesho, usazi ukuba izala imfazwe.

24.verse: Ke umkhonzi weNkosi akamele kulwa; umele ukuba nokuthantamisa kubantu bonke, enokufundisa, enyamezela ububi,

25.verse: ebaqeqesha ngobulali abo baphikayo; ukuba akangethi na kanti uThixo abaphe inguquko esa ekuyazini inyaniso,

26.verse: babuye baqabuke, baphume esibatheni sakhe uMtyholi,  ababanjiselwe ukuthanda kwakhe nguye.

1.verse: Ke, kwazi oku, ukuba ngemihla yokugqibela kuya kufika amaxesha anomngcipheko.

2.verse: Kuba abantu baya kuba ngabazithandayo, abathandi bemali,  abaqhankqalazi, abakratshi, abanyelisi, abangeva bazali,

3.verse: abangabuleliyo, abangengcwele, abangenabubele,  abangenatarhu, abatyholi, abangenakuzeyisa, izibhoja,  abangenakuthanda kulunga,

4.verse: abancethezi, izityhuthutyhuthu, abathiwe lwale likratshi,  abathandi beziyolo kunokuba bathande uThixo;

5.verse: benokumila kokuhlonela uThixo, ukanti bayawakhanyela amandla ako. Kwabo ke khwebuka.

6.verse: Kuba baphuma kwaba, abo banyebelezela ezindlwini, bathimbe abafazazana abazono ziziimfumba, bephethwe ziinkanuko ngeenkanuko,

7.verse: behlala befunda, bangaze phofu babe nako ukufika ekuyazini inyaniso.

8.verse: Kwangolo hlobo ke, bathi ooYanes noYambres bamchasa uMoses,  ngokunjalo nabo aba bayayichasa inyaniso. Bangabantu abonakele iingqiqo, abangenakucikideka ngakulo ukholo.

9.verse: Abayi kuhambela phambili ngakumbi; kuba ukungabi nangqiqo kwabo kuya kubonakala kubantu bonke, njengokuba kwaba njalo okwabaya.

10.verse: Ke wena uyilandile eyam imfundiso, ihambo, ingqibo, ukholo,  ukuzeka kade umsindo, uthando, unyamezelo,

11.verse: iintshutshiso, iintlungu ezinjengezo zandihlelayo kwa-Antiyokwe, eIkoniyo, eListra; ukutshutshiswa okunjengoko ndakuthwalayo, yaza iNkosi yandihlangula kuko konke.

12.verse: Nabo bonke ke abathanda ukuhlala ngokuhlonela uThixo kuKristu Yesu baya kutshutshiswa.

13.verse: Ke bona abantu abangendawo noosiyazi, kukhona baya kuhambela phambili ebubini, belahlekisa, belahlekiswa.

14.verse: Ke wena yima ezintweni owazifundayo, waqiniselwa kuzo,  umazi owazifunda kuye;

15.verse: nokuba uzaze kwasebuntwaneni izibhalo ezingcwele, ezinako ukukulumkisela elusindisweni ngokukholwa kuKristu Yesu.

16.verse: Sonke isibhalo, siphefumlelwe nguThixo nje, sikwancedela ukufundisa, ukohlwaya, ukululeka, ukuqeqesha okusebulungiseni,

17.verse: ukuze umntu kaThixo afaneleke, exhobele wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.

1.verse: Ndiyaqononondisa mna ngoko emehlweni kaThixo, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, oza kugweba abaphilileyo nabafileyo,  kwanangokubonakala kwakhe nobukumkani bakhe:

2.verse: livakalise ilizwi; zingisa ukwenjenjalo ngamathuba alungileyo naxakileyo; yohlwaya, khalimela, vuselela, unako konke ukuzeka kade umsindo, nokufundisa.

3.verse: Kuba kuya kubakho ixesha abangayi kuyinyamezela imfundiso ephilileyo; baya kusuka ngokweenkanuko zabo bazifumbele abafundisi, bebaba iindlebe;

4.verse: babeya kuzisonga zimke iindlebe kuyo inyaniso, baphambukele ke kuzo iintsomi.

5.verse: Ke wena yiba yingcathu ezintweni zonke, nyamezela ububi,  umsebenzi womshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo wenze, buzalise ubulungiseleli bakho.

6.verse: Kuba mna sendithululwa ngokomnikelo; nalo ixesha lokunduluka kwam likufuphi.

7.verse: Umzamo omhle ndiwuzamile, ugqatso ndilufezile, ukholo ndilugcinile.

8.verse: Okokugqibela ndibekelwe isithsaba sobulungisa, eya kundibuyisela ngaso ngaloo mini iNkosi, umgwebi olilungisa;  ingabi ndim ndedwa ke, ibe ngabo bonke abakuthandayo ukubonakala kwayo.

10.verse: kuba uDemasi wandishiya ngokuthanda iphakade langoku, waya eTesalonika; uKreske uye kwelaseGalati; uTito uye kwelaseDalmati.

11.verse: NguLuka yedwa onam. Thabatha uMarko uze naye; kuba unokundinceda kakuhle kumsebenzi wokulungiselela.

13.verse: Ingubo endayishiya eTrowa kuKarpo, uze uyiphathe ekuzeni kwakho, neencwadi ezo, ngokukodwa ezezintsu.

14.verse: UAlesandire, umkhandi wobhedu, wandenza izinto ezininzi ezimbi; iNkosi iya kumbuyekeza ngokwemisebenzi yakhe.

15.verse: Mlumkele nawe; kuba wawachasa kunene amazwi ethu.

16.verse: Kokokuqala ukuziphendulela kwam, akubangakho namnye unam,  basuka bonke bandishiya; kwanga akungebalelwe kubo oko.

17.verse: Noko ke iNkosi yandinceda, yandomeleza; ukuze ngam uvakaliso lweendaba ezilungileyo luzaliseke, neentlanga zonke zive; ndaza ndahlangulwa emlonyeni wengonyama.

18.verse: Isaya kundihlangula yona iNkosi kuwo wonke umsebenzi ongendawo, indisindisele ebukumkanini bayo obusemazulwini; kuyo makubekho uzuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.

20.verse: UErasto wasala eKorinte. Ke uTrofimo ndamshiya eMileto esifa.

21.verse: Khawuleza uze, kungekabi sebusika. Uya kubulisa uYubhulo,  noPudens, noLino, noKlawudiya, nabo abazalwana bonke.

22.verse: INkosi uYesu Kristu mayibe nomoya wakho. Ubabalo malube nani. Amen.
